metadata.name: 'BLAST' (2023)
metadata.description:
The basis of BLAST comes from my love of RTFKT community. I have priceless friendships and experiences thanks to this community. If you look at the piece, you will see there are lots of RTFKT details. 


The expression of the BLAST piece for me is that the moment human beings discover their own potential, they are unstoppable. This can be both mentally and physically. Socrates has a point-blank saying on this subject;

"It is a shame for a man to grow old without seeing the beauty and strength of which his body is capable."  
Socrates

Here is BLAST! The first piece of Stray Series.

6250x6250x150  
13.7 MB  
12.3 Hours
